body.p: Dear sir I Enclose you the resignation & Letters of Capt Postlethwait Will you be so kind as to see the Gov for me and procure for me the appointment of Notary Public the appointment will be of service to me as there are some things that I cant do as magistrate that notery Publics can do please atend to it for me and I will Pay any Expence that accours I presume my Loyalty is inquestionable in Frankfort as I was sent as a special messenger from Gen Burbradges head Quarters to Frankfort during the morgan raid
